articles.description: Japan's Toyota Motor Corp overtook Germany's Volkswagen in vehicle sales last year, regaining pole position as the world's top selling automaker for the first time in five years as the pandemic demand slump hit its German rival harder.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
TOKYO (Reuters) - Japans Toyota Motor Corp overtook Germanys Volkswagen in vehicle sales last year, regaining pole position as the worlds top selling automaker for the first time in… [+971 chars]

articles.title: BJP Misses Minus Sign While Sharing Indias IMF GDP Growth Data - BOOM
articles.description: A posters show Indias growth estimates as 8% instead of -8% for 2020; something that they did for...
articles.content: A graphic, put out by the social media channels of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP), has missed a negative sign before India's gross domestic product estimates for 2020 released on January 26 by the … [+2999 chars]

articles.author: Tinesh Bhasin
articles.title: How to know if your device is hacked - Mint
articles.description: Don't allow apps to read the OTP (one-time password) that you receive via SMS. Instead, fill it manually.Avoid doing a financial transaction on public Wi-Fi and don't use public charging stations
articles.content: Data Privacy Day is celebrated every year on 28 January. The purpose of the event is to raise awareness about data privacy. Besides the US and Canada, the event is observed in several European countr… [+4526 chars]
